title: GoodFellas
creator_credit: Richard Bruno, Nicholas Pileggi, Irwin Winkler, Kristi Zea, Martin Scorsese and Winkler Films
headline_credit: United States and United States of America, 1990
brief_description: Considered to be one of Scorsese’s finest – and most disturbing – films, Goodfellas explores a world where mobsters ruled the roost, splashed the cash, controlled the cops and provided glamorous role models – before it comes crashing down.

constellations_other.name: Gunslingers, good fellas and flea bags
constellations_other.description: Explore how a 1903 western changed the course of filmmaking and videogames by breaking the fourth wall.

constellations_other.name: Culture, food and family
constellations_other.description: Food as a link to culture and family.

creator_credit_for_label: Richard Bruno, Nicholas Pileggi, Irwin Winkler, Kristi Zea, Martin Scorsese and Winkler Films
headline_credit_for_label: United States and United States of America, 1990
description: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.
description_for_label: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.
